Subject: Powering Up
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

    Deep within the volcano the golden pyramid seemed to glow a tad brighter. 
 The Key had come in contact with one of the ancient scripts filled with 
micro-technology.  As soon as the Key had come near the ancient script, a 
tight laser beam message heavily encoded ten times over in a mix of several 
different extinct races' languages had been sent to the pyramid.  It's 
instructions were clear.  Await the arrival of the Prophecized One, and let 
the machine's master be resurrected after his ten thousand year slumber.
